channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitachi Energy -- MicroSCADA SYS600
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hitachi Energy -- MicroSCADA SYS600

item.title: CVE-2024-4872|2024-08-27T13:46:49.222Z -- hitachi%20energy -- microscada%20sys600
item.description: The product does not validate any query towards persistent data, resulting in a risk of injection attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-7940|2024-08-27T13:43:15.252Z -- hitachi%20energy -- microscada%20sys600
item.description: The product exposes a service that is intended for local only to all network interfaces without any authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-7941|2024-08-27T13:12:59.267Z -- hitachi%20energy -- microscada%20sys600
item.description: An HTTP parameter may contain a URL value and could cause the web application to redirect the request to the specified URL. By modifying the URL value to a malicious site, an attacker may successfully launch a phishing scam and steal user credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-3982|2024-08-27T12:47:21.577Z -- hitachi%20energy -- microscada%20sys600
item.description: An attacker with local access to machine where MicroSCADA X SYS600 is installed, could enable the session logging supporting the product and try to exploit a session hijacking of an already established session. By default, the session logging level is not enabled and only users with administrator rights can enable it.

item.title: CVE-2024-7941|2024-08-27T12:57:55.044Z -- hitachi%20energy -- microscada%20sys600
item.description: An HTTP parameter may contain a URL value and could cause the web application to redirect the request to the specified URL. By modifying the URL value to a malicious site, an attacker may successfully launch a phishing scam and steal user credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-7940|2024-08-27T12:52:54.589Z -- hitachi%20energy -- microscada%20sys600
item.description: The product exposes a service that is intended for local only to all network interfaces without any authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-4872|2024-08-27T12:37:28.958Z -- hitachi%20energy -- microscada%20sys600
item.description: The product does not validate any query towards persistent data, resulting in a risk of injection attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-3980|2024-08-27T12:42:41.124Z -- hitachi%20energy -- microscada%20sys600
item.description: The product allows user input to control or influence paths or file names that are used in filesystem operations, allowing the attacker to access or modify system files or other files that are critical to the application.
